GetSubMenu(int)

Retrieves the sub-Menu at an index-offset from the current Menu.

public Menu GetSubMenu(int index)

Parameters

index int

The sub-Menu index. An index of 0 is the Menu represented by this MenuTestScene.MenuStructure.

Generates a new MenuTestScene.MenuStructure for the a sub-Menu.

public MenuTestScene.MenuStructure GetSubStructure(int index)

Parameters

index int

The sub-Menu index to generate the MenuTestScene.MenuStructure for. An index of 0 is the Menu represented by this MenuTestScene.MenuStructure.
